featured.text: For example, in a wedding banquet it is common to see a pair of ice-sculpted swans that represent the union of the new couple. 49.

definition.zh_def: 天鵝，一種大型水鳥，通常有長脖子和優雅的外形，常見於湖泊和河流中。
definition.en_def: A swan is a large waterbird known for its long neck and graceful appearance, commonly found in lakes and rivers.
definition.example: The swan glided gracefully across the lake.
